title: BLOUSON JACKET
description: Reversible jacket with shirt collar and welt pockets. Front zip fastening. Made of multicolor fabric and silk. Customized with FF motif in yellow on one side and red on the other.

title: T-SHIRT
description: Short-sleeved crew-neck T-shirt. Made with white cotton jersey. The Bag Bugs eyes appliqués are customized with the Fashion Show motif inspired by playing cards.

title: T-SHIRT
description: Short-sleeved crew-neck T-shirt. Made with black cotton jersey. Heat-sealed appliqués in the shape of Bag Bugs eyes with upturned F.

title: T-SHIRT
description: Short-sleeved crew-neck T-shirt. Made with white cotton jersey. Bag Bugs eye shaped appliqués.

title: SWEATSHIRT
description: Long-sleeved sweatshirt with crew neck. Made of black cotton jersey. Customized with heat-sealed micro-mesh FF appliqué in white.

title: SWEATSHIRT
description: Long-sleeved crew-neck sweatshirt. Made of white cotton jersey. Customized with heat-sealed micro-mesh FF appliqués in black.

title: T-SHIRT
description: Short-sleeved crew-neck T-shirt. Made with black cotton jersey. Customized with heat-sealed micromesh FF appliqués in white.

title: T-SHIRT
description: Short-sleeved crew-neck T-shirt. Made with white cotton jersey. Customized with heat-sealed micromesh FF appliqués in black.

title: WALLET
description: Wallet with eight interior card slots and two compartments for bills. Made of glazed jacquard fabric with black FF motif. Decorated with Fendi Stamp appliqué in leather.

title: CARD HOLDER
description: Vertical wallet with six interior card slots, flat pockets and a compartment for bills. Made of glazed jacquard fabric with black FF motif. Decorated with Fendi Stamp appliqué in leather.

title: POUCH
description: Slim zippered pouch. Made of glazed jacquard fabric with black FF motif. Decorated with Fendi Stamp appliqué in leather. Palladium-finish metalware.

title: ZIP-AROUND
description: Wallet with zipper. Organized into three gusseted compartments with eight card slots and a zippered pocket. Made of glazed fabric with red FF motif. Fendi Stamp appliqué in black leather.

title: WALLET
description: Wallet with eight interior card slots and two compartments for bills. Made of glazed jacquard fabric with red FF motif. Decorated with Fendi Stamp appliqué in leather.

title: CARD HOLDER
description: Bi-fold card holder with 6 slots, a bill compartment and two flat pockets. Made of glazed fabric with red FF motif. Fendi Stamp appliqué in black leather.

title: POUCH
description: Slim zippered pouch. Made of black Roman leather. Contrasting inlay with Fashion Show JOKARL print inspired by playing cards. Palladium-finish metalware.

title: CLUTCH
description: Pochette with zip closure. Flat inside pocket. Made of black and red calfskin. The print reproduces the anagram of the word FENDI, laser-cut in a contrasting color. Internal lining customized with multicolor print. Palladium-finish metalware.

title: BELT
description: Belt with single loop. Buckle with stud fastening. Made of smooth black calfskin. Enameled metal buckle with Fendi Label motif and palladium finish.

title: FENDIFIEND
description: FendiFiend sunglasses characterized by their contemporary cat-eye shape. This style is made of metal with a gold finish and features a unique “UFO” construction, a red metallic wire that frames the lenses, creating a retro-futuristic geometric effect. Triangular temples customized with Fendi logo engraving and red temple tips. Adjustable nosepads. Red lenses.

title: T-SHIRT
description: Short-sleeved crew-neck T-shirt. Made with beige cotton jersey. Customized with diagonal FF motif in black. Contrasting red diagonal stripes.

title: FF
description: Round-shaped FF sunglasses, with dark gray transparent optyl front and metallic temples with ruthenium finish. The light and sophisticated lines of this style are customized with the iconic FF motif, engraved on the edges of the lenses and on the metal half circle. Complemented by triangular rivets, adjustable nosepads and contrasting tips. Pink lenses.

title: FENDIFIEND
description: FendiFiend sunglasses characterized by their contemporary cat-eye shape. This style is made of black metal and features a unique “UFO” construction, a metallic wire that frames the lenses, creating a retro-futuristic geometric effect. Triangular temples customized with Fendi logo engraving and tone-on-tone temple tips. Adjustable nosepads. Gray lenses.

title: WRIST STRAP
description: Key ring with clip. Made of brown glazed jacquard fabric. Decorated with macro FF in yellow rubber. Trimmed with leather. Accessori metallici con finitura dorata.

title: SOCKS
description: Short five-toe socks. Made of dark brown nylon with color-block details and contrasting FENDI lettering.

title: STRAP YOU
description: Long shoulder strap with double clip, to use in combination with any bag with hooks. Made of glazed jacquard fabric with red FF motif. Decorated with macro FF in black rubber. Palladium-finish metalware.

title: KEY RING
description: Branded Fendi card deck holder, with snap buttons and clip. Made of yellow Roman leather. Trimmed with “Metal Stitch” hand stitching. Palladium-finish metalware.

title: SHAWL
description: Square shawl finished with hand-frayed hems. Made of blue wool and silk. The jacquard weave creates a pictorial frame and the FF motif in tones of black.

title: BELT BAG
description: Small belt bag with zip fastening. Front zipper pocket and internal mesh pocket. Adjustable belt. Made of glazed jacquard fabric with brown FF motif. Decorated with Fendi Stamp appliqué in leather.

title: KEY RING
description: Fendi Label key ring with clip and customized ring. Made of palladium-finish metal. Enameled details in black and red.

title: COIN PURSE
description: Die-shaped charm with zip closure. Leather strap and clip with branded plate. Made of black sheepskin with inlaid red FF motif. Palladium-finish metalware.

title: COIN PURSE
description: Die-shaped charm with zip closure. Leather strap and clip with branded plate. Made of white Romano leather with contrasting black FF motif appliqué. Palladium-finish metalware.

title: BOCCIA CHARM
description: Pom-pom charm with leather strap, clip and customized plate. Made of mink fur with FF and striped motif inlay in black, white and red. Palladium-finish metalware.

title: MINI STRAP YOU
description: Short shoulder strap with double clip, to use in combination with any bag with hooks. Made of glazed jacquard fabric with red FF motif. Decorated with macro FF in black rubber. Palladium-finish metalware.

title: FENDI
description: Sturdy and featherlight round-shaped sunglasses made of black acetate. The urban feel of this model is accentuated by the ultra-flat front and the construction of the temples, distinguished by a gold-colored metal core with the iconic FF motif embossing visible on the inner side. Complemented by vertical rivets and laser engraved Fendi logo. Blue lenses.

title: FENDI
description: Sturdy and extremely light square-shaped sunglasses made of black acetate. The urban feel of this model is accentuated by the ultra-flat front and the construction of the temples, distinguished by a gold-colored metal core with the iconic FF motif embossing visible on the inner side. Complemented by vertical rivets and laser-engraved Fendi logo. Green lenses.

title: FF
description: Square-shaped FF sunglasses, with dark gray transparent optyl front and metallic temples with ruthenium finish. The light and sophisticated lines of this style are customized with the iconic FF motif, engraved on the edges of the lenses and on the metal half circle. Complemented by triangular rivets, adjustable nosepads and contrasting tips. Green lenses.

title: FF
description: Square-shaped FF sunglasses, with transparent optyl front and metallic temples with gold finish. The light and sophisticated lines of this style are customized with the iconic FF motif, engraved on the edges of the lenses and on the metal half circle. Complemented by triangular rivets, adjustable nosepads and contrasting tips. Ivory-gray lenses.

title: FF
description: Square-shaped FF sunglasses, with gray transparent optyl front and metallic temples with gold finish. The light and sophisticated lines of this style are customized with the iconic FF motif, engraved on the edges of the lenses and on the metal half circle. Complemented by triangular rivets, adjustable nosepads and contrasting tips. Blue lenses.

title: BELT
description: Reversible belt with single loop. Metal pin buckle. Made of red calfskin, with FF motif. Black leather interior. Metallic accessories.

title: BELT
description: Tone-on-tone belt with loop. The stud fastening has a minimal F-shaped design. Made of Romano leather in midnight blue. Palladium-finish metalware.

title: DOWN JACKET
description: Down jacket with high collar and removable hood. Side pockets with zipper. Front zip fastening. Made with black nylon. Customized with heat-sealed micromesh appliqués in the shape of Bag Bugs eyes.

title: WINDBREAKER
description: Reversible jacket with hood and welt pockets. Front zip fastening. Made of black nylon. Printed with the JoKarl playing card on the chest and back.

title: T-SHIRT
description: Long-sleeved crew-neck T-shirt. Made of black cotton jersey. Customized with JoKarl Fashion Show print inspired by playing cards on the front, and FF cubes on the sleeves.

title: T-SHIRT
description: Short-sleeved crew-neck T-shirt. Made with black cotton jersey. The Bag Bugs eye appliqués are customized with the Fashion Show motif inspired by playing cards.

title: CLUTCH
description: Pochette with zip closure. Flat inside pocket. Made of smooth black calfskin. The screen-printed appliqués in the shape of Bag Bugs eyes are customized with a reversed F. Palladium-finish metalware.

title: WALLET
description: Wallet with eight interior card slots and two compartments for bills. Made of smooth black calfskin. Red leather interior. The screen-printed appliqués in the shape of Bag Bugs eyes are customized with a reversed F.

title: PEEKABOO X-LITE FIT
description: Tote bag distinguished by a rigid panel on the back and a soft front section with turn-lock closure. Briefcase handle and adjustable and detachable shoulder strap. Zipper pocket on the inside. Made of brown Romano leather. The pocket is made of glazed fabric with brown FF motif and customized with a metal plate. Palladium-finish metalware.

title: PEEKABOO X-LITE FIT
description: Tote bag distinguished by a rigid panel on the back and a soft front section with turn-lock closure. Briefcase handle and adjustable and detachable shoulder strap. Zipper pocket on the inside. Made of Romano leather in asphalt gray. The pocket is made of glazed fabric with black FF motif and customized with a metal name plate. Palladium-finish metalware.

title: MINI PEEKABOO FIT
description: Small handbag made with two compartments divided by a stiff partition. Internal zippered pocket. Front hook fastening. Briefcase handle and a long adjustable and detachable shoulder strap. Made of black Roman leather. Embossed appliqués in the shape of Bag Bugs eyes. Palladium-finish metalware.

title: FLAT POUCH
description: Large pochette with removable shoulder strap, snap-button fastening. Interior gusseted compartment with eight card slots, passport holder, bill compartment and zippered pocket. Made of black Roman leather. Equipped with external zipper pocket and small pocket in glazed jacquard fabric with FF motif in matching shade, snap-button fastening. Fabric shoulder strap with macro FF. Palladium-finish metalware.

title: LOAFERS
description: Driver-style loafers. Flexible pebble sole. Made of calfskin and brown sporty suede-effect split leather. PU loop with brown and black FF motif made with a hydrographic technique.

title: SNEAKERS
description: Lace-up sneakers with high wavy sole. Made of whitecalfskin. The upper, treated all over with photosensitive technology, reveals the iconic FF pattern in yellow under the light. Multilayer sole with contrasting insert.

title: SNEAKERS
description: Lace-up sneakers with high wavy sole. The asymmetric design is defined by transparent details on the inner side and micro-mesh tech fabric inserts. Made of calfskin in a white and brown color-block effect. Customized with a diagonal FF pattern printed in the iconic brown and black colors. Bicolor multilayer soles.

title: SNEAKERS
description: Lace-up sneakers. Rubber cupsole. The asymmetric design is defined by transparent details on the inner side and micro-mesh tech fabric inserts. Made of white calfskin. The outside of the shoe is made of yellow Romano leather.

title: SNEAKERS
description: Lace-up sneakers lined with lightly padded micro-mesh tech fabric. Rubber cup sole. Made of black calf leather. Decorated with micro-appliqués in the shape of Bag Bugs eyes on the tongue. Accessori metallici con finitura dorata.

title: ESPADRILLES
description: Espadrilles with fold-down deerskin heel counter, allowing the shoes to be worn as slippers. Rope and rubber sole. Made of red sporty suede. White leather appliqués in the shape of Bag Bugs eyes. Grosgrain ribbon accents. Leather lining.

title: ESPADRILLES
description: Espadrilles with cord and rubber sole. Made of suede-effect split leather in yellow. The elastic ribbon toe is customized with diagonal Pequin motif and FF in brown and black. Grosgrain ribbon trim and yellow zig-zag stitching.

title: SANDALS
description: Running sandals with elastic bands that wrap around the foot, slingback straps and padded cushions. The light and flexible polyurethane base is complemented by a rubber sole and air cushion. Adjustable ribbon fastener and sporty buckle. Made of PU and black calfskin. The bands are decorated with a striped motif in black, gray and red.

title: SANDALS
description: Running sandals with high strap. The light and flexible polyurethane base is complemented by a rubber sole and air cushion. Made of PU and black leather. The strap is made of glazed jacquard fabric with brown FF motif. Decorated with Fendi Stamp appliqué.

title: CARD HOLDER
description: Card holder with six slots and flat central pocket. Made of black calf leather. Glazed jacquard fabric insert with black FF motif.

title: FLAT POUCH
description: Large pochette with removable shoulder strap, snap-button fastening. Interior gusseted compartment with eight card slots, passport pocket, bill compartment and zippered pocket. Made of red Romano leather. Equipped with external zippered pocket and small pocket in glazed jacquard fabric with contrasting FF motif, snap-button closure. Fabric shoulder strap with macro FF. Palladium-finish metalware.

title: SNEAKERS
description: Lace-up sneakers. Rubber cupsole. Made of calfskin and white mesh. The reversible tongue is customized with contrasting mesh macro FF motif. Detail in red leather on the back of the heel.

description: Reversible padded vest with pockets on both sides. Zip fastening. Made with black nylon. One side is customized with heat-sealed Bag Bugs eyes appliqués, while the other is quilted in white.

Triangular temples customized with engraved Fendi logo and yellow tips. Slender bridge and adjustable nose pads. Gray lenses.

description: Small belt bag with zip fastening. Front zipper pocket and internal mesh pocket. Adjustable belt. Made of jacquard fabric with iconic brown Pequin striped motif. Fendi Label appliqué in printed leather with gold lettering. Palladium-finish metalware.

title: SNEAKERS
description: Running shoes with wavy rubber sole. Adjustable ribbon fastener with Velcro and sporty buckle. Made of black tech mesh. The details in yellow rubberized film accentuate the shape of the shoe.

description: Short-sleeved crew-neck T-shirt. Made with black cotton. Red rhinestone embroidery forms two entwined snakes and contrasting FF motif.

description: Wide-design backpack, closure with single buckle. Front pocket with flap and internal pockets. Technical mesh back and adjustable shoulder straps. Made of black nylon. Flap and pocket made of glazed fabric with brown FF motif. Decorated with Fendi Stamp appliqué in leather.

title: SNEAKERS
description: Lace-up sneakers. Rubber cupsole. Tech micromesh and knitted details. Made of black nappa leather. The outside of the shoe is customized with a diagonal FF printed pattern.

description: Light, structured handbag, distinguished by a rigid panel on the back and a soft front section with turn-lock closure. Briefcase handle and adjustable and detachable shoulder strap. title: SNEAKERS
description: Running sneakers with trekking-style laces. Undulated rubber soles. Made of black scuba. The Fendi/Fiend print reproduces the FENDI anagram in contrasting colors on the right shoe. Red sole.

description: Long-sleeved crew-neck T-shirt. Made of black cotton jersey. Customized with the Fashion Show Roma Amor print that reproduces an anagram of the word ROMA on the front, with devils and squares on the sleeves.

title: HAT
description: Reversible fisherman-style hat. Can be folded into the zippered pouch. Made of fabric with striped brown Pequin motif. FF lining. Embroidered Fendi Label patch.

title: MON TRESOR
description: Sports bag with drawstring closure. Two pockets with external zippers and structured compartment on the bottom. The bag is equipped with removable handle and shoulder strap. Made of Pequin striped fabric in brown. Trimmed with sport-inspired reflector details. The tricolor strap is branded with a Fendi Label shoulder piece printed in gold. Palladium-finish metalware.

title: PANTS
description: Relax-fit pants with sewn-in pleat and tapered leg. The style includes slant pockets and a stretch waist with drawstring. Made of black wool. Characterized by needle-punched wool. FF motif embroidered on the back.

title: SHIRT
description: Regular-fit shirt with small collar. Visible tone-on-tone button fastening. Made with black fabric. Customized with the Fashion Show print that reproduces a tangle of green snakes with contrasting FF motif.

title: T-SHIRT
description: Short-sleeved polo shirt. This style has the classic collar with button fastening. Made with red cotton piqué. The Fashion Show print reproduces a tangle of black snakes with contrasting FF motif.

title: PEEKABOO X-LITE FIT
description: Slim tote bag distinguished by a rigid panel on the back and a soft front section with turn-lock fastener. Briefcase handle and adjustable and detachable shoulder strap. Zipper pocket on the inside. Made of black Roman leather. The pocket is customized with a metal plate Palladium-finish metalware.

title: FENDIFIEND
description: FendiFiend sunglasses characterized by their contemporary cat-eye shape. This style is made of metal with a gold finish and features a unique “UFO” construction, a brown metallic wire that frames the lenses, creating a retro-futuristic geometric effect. Triangular temples customized with engraved Fendi logo and brown temple tips. Adjustable nosepads. Brown lenses.

Decorated with lenticular Bag Bugs eyes that alternate between the striped Pequin motif and the brown FF pattern. Accessori metallici con finitura dorata. Silver Selleria plaque engraved with the serial numbers.

title: DENIM
description: Slim-fit 5-pocket pants. Finished with customized rivets and buttons. Made of black cotton denim. Customized with laser engraved logo.
